data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Dembeni, Mayotte not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Dembeni, Mayotte
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Dembeni, Mayotte.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 3,796 lost in Dembeni that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Dembeni, Mayotte need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Dembeni.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Dembeni.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Dembeni, Mayotte.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.section_summary:
the state of Dembeni, Mayotte has a population of 3,800.

We estimate Dembeni has 4 people who might know Jesus, 58 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,738 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 949 neighbors who need Jesus.
